name: ZOMBIESSS
description:
ZOMBIESSS is a small game I decided to create when I was bored and ever since I've been coming to the game every so often to do small updates.

This game wasn't made to be published nor get a bunch of downloads so don't expect a game with great quality.

Controls

 • WASD to move
 • Right Click to shoot
 • Left Click to throw a grenade
 • F to open the shop
 • E to activate invincibility
 • ESC to pause

Cheats

You can enable cheats by clicking 2-0-2-2 on your keyboard. Currently, the only cheats available are the following:
 i - Enable/Disable Godmode
 O - Give yourself +$100
 P - Skip The Round

This is my first published game; feel free to leave your honest feedback. :)

PS: Select the "Small" map size, it's more fun.
